item.title: A fashion project ,where all people can dive into Styles[IN Progress ]
item.description: Abstract Alzheimer‚Äôs disease (AD) is a chronic neurodegenerative disease which leads to the gradual loss of neuronal cells. Several hypotheses for AD exists (e.g., cholinergic, amyloid, tau hypotheses, etc.). As per the cholinergic hypothesis, the deficiency of choline is responsible for AD; therefore, the inhibition of AChE is a lucrative therapeutic strategy for the treatment of AD. Acetylcholinesterase (AChE) is an enzyme that catalyzes the breakdown of the neurotransmitter acetylcholine that is essential for cognition and memory.

item.title: About
item.description: In my daytime, I work as a Software test engineer at a Korean Tech company. At night, I engage in writing and learning something new, often divergent from my daily profession. Although not a coder by trade, I am enthusiastic about learning coding and developing new skills. Essentially, I am someone who pursues knowledge in any field that captivates my interest. Visit the below blog ,to read my stories: üìù Blogs.

item.title: Against All Odds : Tails Of Triumph
item.description: Preview In a world that often measures worth by perceived perfection, there exists a soul whose journey defies every expectation. Born with disorders that set them apart from their peers, they faced a childhood marked by misunderstanding and adversity. Yet, through every trial inflicted by others’ ignorance and cruelty, they forged an inner strength fueled by resilience and a relentless spirit. Their story is not merely one of survival but of defiance‚Äîa testament to the human spirit’s capacity to rise above circumstances.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Thank you for visiting my professional portfolio. I would love to hear from you! Please feel free to get in touch with me using any of the following methods: Email: gowdanittesh@gmail.com Phone: +91 8660979912 LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/nittesh-r/ Additionally, you can also shoot a mail about what some other projects that I can work on. Thank you for your interest in my work. I look forward to connecting with you!

item.title: Music
item.description: When I’m not tweaking my repo, I compose music. Achievements Featured on SoundCloud Radio hosted by Dylan Berry. Featured on The Rolling Strone Magazine and on their socials. Surpassed over 3,00,000 streams online. Peaked at #61 Position on House: Armenia charts on Apple Music. Listen to my music on your favorite music streaming/download platfrom
